group_1.textLeft: It's a pleasure to meet you three.
My name is Amaryllis.
I am Lady Junia's handmaiden…

group_1.textRight: (Junia…wasn't that the other girl from@my dream earlier…?)

group_1.textLeft: Junia is my twin sister.@We usually live apart.

group_1.textRight: …This is making my head spin…

group_1.textCenter: …It's all good★@I think I'm almost getting it!

group_1.narration: "Cornelia is the lady of this villa and@has a twin sister named Junia."
"Junia was adopted by another family@at a very young age."
"Today is a day where Junia is@visiting her birth parents.@Since Amaryllis has time on her hands,@she came to see Cornelia."

group_1.textRight: …I believe that's the situation at hand?

group_1.textLeft: That about sums it up, thanks★

group_1.textRight: …Who are you speaking to, Himena?

group_1.textLeft: Ah… Lady Cornelia, are you unable to see@Lady Nemu?

group_1.textRight: Sorry, only Magical Girls can perceive me.
I'll try to make some adjustments so she can@hear my voice.
…How is that?

group_1.textLeft: Oh… I just heard the girl's voice,@but I can't see her…
It seems you and your cohort are just@like Amaryllis.
You have strange, marvelous powers.
Looks like it.@[chara:105301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:105301:cheek_0][chara:105301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:105301:motion_100][chara:105301:lipSynch_1]...Oh, could it be?!
Are the three of you just like me?
Have you traveled from the future@to change the past?

group_1.textRight: [chara:102901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh…?!
No way, no way, you're a time traveler too?!
So you're from the future then, Amaryllis?

group_1.textLeft: Yes…

group_1.narration: "In approximately two and a half years,@Pompeii will be struck by a terrible calamity,@annihilating it in the span of a single night."
"I began anew in the world of the past,@undertaking the mission of informing the people@to save them from the coming disaster."
"By Master Cubius, I swear to devote@my entire being to this cause…"

group_1.textRight: Cubius…@It seems she is referring to Kyubey.
The city of Pompeii was destroyed by@the eruption of Mount Vesuvius,
which occurred near the end of the year 79 CE@as per our modern calendar.
Since we've arrived two and a half years early…@We are in Pompeii, in the year 77 CE.

group_1.textLeft: What brought you all to this city, Himena?

group_1.textRight: Us cuties…
We're here looking for the traces of somebody@important to us.
We're from two thousand years in the future.

group_1.textLeft: Oh my…@Two thousand years in the future?!

group_1.textRight: You're from even farther in the future@than Amaryllis!

group_1.textLeft: So it seems…
On the day of the disaster, I supplicated myself@to Master Cubius,
and found myself reborn as I was about@three years ago,
so I only went back by that amount of time.

group_1.textRight: Three years…?@Wasn't it two and a half?

group_1.textLeft: Ah…it's been several months since my rebirth!

group_1.textRight: That makes sense.

group_1.textLeft: First thing I did was to tell everyone about@what would happen…
But when I talked about how the mountain@will soon crack,
and fire and stone will rain down from the sky,@nobody believed me…
It's like the story of Cassandra, Princess of Troy,@who was cursed so no one believed her prophecies.
I wonder if she felt as I did…?

group_1.textRight: People just didn't want to believe it.
They all thought the tragedy was over.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean by that?

group_1.textRight: In 62 CE, about fifteen years ago…@Pompeii was struck by a massive earthquake.
Many buildings collapsed, and reconstruction@is still underway as we speak.

group_1.textLeft: Yes… It occurred just before we were born.
So that earthquake was a sign of the coming eruption…?

group_1.textRight: It is likely, yes.

group_1.textLeft: What with everyone laboring so hard@to rebuild the city,
nobody would think of running away@and abandoning it.
…But not Lady Cornelia.
Even though we'd never met before,@she believed what I had to say!
